features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新灵动胶囊新增视频通话美颜，优化状态栏和部分场景性能体验，提升系统稳定性，合入安全补丁，推荐您进行更新。
优化状态栏字体图标显示，增大字体字号，加粗图标样式，提高信息识别度。
新增视频通话美颜开关，设置路径：设置>通知和状态栏>灵动胶囊>视频美颜。 微信视频通话场景下，新增灵动胶囊形态的视频美颜调级，设置路径：设置>辅助功能>音视频通话增强>视频通话美颜。
优化部分场景性能体验。
提升系统稳定性，让您的手机运行更稳定。
合入安卓2024年9月安全补丁，增强系统安全性。有关荣耀软件安全更新内容的信息，请访问荣耀官方网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/support/bulletin/2024/9
1. 本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2. 更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3. 如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或访问荣耀官方服务网站 https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us 寻求支持。

Dear user, in this update, Beauty can be enabled or disabled via Magic Capsule in video calls. This release also optimizes the status bar and the performance experience in some scenarios. Additionally, this update improves the system stability, and incorporates a security patch.
Enhances information recognition by increasing the text size and bolding the icons.

Beauty can be enabled or disabled for video calls as needed. Try it out by going to: Settings > Notifications and status bar > Magic Capsule > Beauty. Beauty effect can be adjusted via Magic Capsule during WeChat video calls. Try it out by going to: Settings > Accessibility features > Call enhancement > Video Call Beauty.
Optimizes the performance experience in some scenarios.
Improves the system stability to make your device run more stably.

Android Security Patch (Sept 2024) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about HONOR Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2024/9

1. Installing this update will not affect your personal data, but it is still recommended to back up your data before updating. 2. Check out more information on product features in the Tips app. 3. If you encounter any problem during use, please get support by going to My HONOR or visiting our website: https://www.honor.com/cn/contact-us.
